description: This file defines the main navigation structure for a React Native app, including a bottom tab navigator and a stack navigator for detail screens. It sets themes, icons, and screen options to compose the app's primary navigation layout.

classes.name: Theme
classes.description: Type describing the navigation theme, extended from DefaultTheme with customized colors.

classes.name: TabNavigator
classes.description: Component configuring bottom tab navigation with Discover, Favorites, and Profile screens.

classes.name: RootNavigator
classes.description: Main exported component managing app navigation with tabs and detail stack.

methods.name: Tabs
methods.description: Function returning bottom tab navigator with three main tabs.
